Articles.Content:
long time lurker, first time poster.

Been playing KSP for about forty eight hours now, Steam version.

Having the CTD issue with Win 32 sys, so I learned to use the F5 button before changing screens.

I have played Orbiter before and also playing EvE atm.

Fly safe, fellow Kerbonauts!

Welcome to the community Joe_Bender

There's a few threads in the support section regarding the 32bit Windows crash, hopefully the info there can help you.

Don't forget t press F5, and fly safe!

Edited April 25, 2013 by sal_vager

Thanks Sal.

I am sure that the problem is the Unity Win 32 RAM dump that everyone else is having.

I already read through them and tried most if not all the possible solutions from Affinity to the read only mod. It still didnt help. My plan right now is just to wait for the next patch and see if that fixes the issues.

The patch could be coming out next Tuesday, right?

No worries, the F5 button is my friend, not my good friend.
